name: E (JJ & Friends!)
description:
• Controls: Mouse
  • Audio: Sound effects from mixkit.io. Music from Pixabay. I used text-to-speech for the robot voices.
  • Ages: Everyone

SPOILER: I wrote the lyrics to the end song. The music is "Broadway Walk - Big Band Music" by JuliusH. Listen to the full in-game version on my youtube channel here.
